title: *NEW* Category Feature Publisher Rocket Tutorial
description:
In this lesson I give you a step by step tutorial on how to use the new category feature on publisher rocket.This information is very helpful especially when you're trying to narrow down a niche and find a specific category that suits your book. 

We are accustom to analyzing BSR ranks for keywords for books, but have you ever considered analyzing the categories of books? This way you can narrow down competition, and in this video you'll find out how!





PUBLISHER ROCKET LINK : https://bit.ly/31MnzQF
